runs.comm: in the zone outside off stump, nipping away off the seam, Tamim has a waft and is beaten
short in length, on the hips, clipped behind square leg
hits the deck short of length and it climbs up at some pace, swayed away
beaten. Lovely line and length. Landed on a length, around the off stump and held its line, Nazimuddin stabs inside the line
another one that climbs up awkwardly, Nazimuddin is surprised at the extra bounce but adjust to jab it away to third man. Good start from Powell.
Hello? Tamim backs away to the legside but moves so far out that he can't reach a length delivery bouncing over middle stump line.

West Indies nab their first wicket. Nazimuddin has thrown his wicket away. Short and outside off, he ends up miscuing a pull shot towards mid-on. The bat-face was facing straight up, towards the sky, when he made contact and that did him in
kicks up from short of length, on the middle and leg, jabbed away to square leg
short, wide and Tamim can't reach it. He would have needed a pole.
fuller, on a length, on the middle and leg, Tamim stays back and manages to get a tickle to short fine leg
charge and a miss. Full in length, just outside off stump and he went down the track and tried to turn it to the on side
slightly short in length, on the off and middle, pulled limply towards midwicket
fullish, on the leg stump line, Tamim stays adjacent to the line by not pressing the front foot across and whips it through midwicket
There goes Tamim to the legside - he would keep doing it - but mistimes a drive to mid-off.

And again. He moves to the leg-side, Powell hurls it short and at the body. Somehow, Tamim twists his body and gets his head off the way, even as he attempts a pull shot and top edges it over the 'keeper's head.
fuller, in the corridor outside off stump, Tamim tries to drill it through cover but no wood on leather
almost a mix-up. On the middle and leg, worked to the on side and both batsmen initially wanted a run. They decide against it as they see Powell rush towards the ball
length delivery, slanted across Tamim who punches it to point
stifled appeal for a catch behind the wicket. Full in length, nipping back in off the seam, he shapes to cut but is cramped up and the ball goes off the back thigh to Ramdin
short in length, on the middle and leg stump line, Aftab pulls it majestically over long leg. He made that look pretty easy.
The french cut now. Aftab charges down the track and tries to heave a short-of-length delivery over midwicket and gets an inside-edge to fine leg

that six and four it seems has got to the bowler. He slips this one way down the leg side and Ramdin got a glove to it as the ball bounced just in front of him as he dived to his left and went under the glove
short in length, over middle stump line, Aftab moves to the leg side, tries to dab it to third man and is beaten
full in length, Aftab is down the track, trying to carve it over extra cover and edges it down to third man

Done by the slower one. West Indies have taken out the openers. Tamim, again moves outside leg stump, shapes to heave a fullish delivery but is beaten by the slower one and ends up ballooning it to mid-on
What was that? Full in length, outside off stump, Ashraful has a slog across the line - never mind this is his first ball - and gets an edge between the keeper and the first slip. High over them.
Another risky stroke, another four. Short and at the body, Ash tries to pull it and edges it to left of Ramdin.
Whack. Pure slog. Full in length, outside the off stump and Ashraful swat-pulls it over mid-on.
Unadulterated slogging continues. He moves outside leg stump and swipes a length delivery past midwicket.
Again he backs to the leg-side and this time fails to connect his attempted drive through the off side.
Four balls in six balls. Overpitched outside off stump, Ashraful carves it over cover point. Bangladesh have flown to 46. 34 runs in the last two overs
length delivery, on the off and middle, pulled just over midwicket.
Six over fine leg! Welcome to Twenty20! Ash walks across the sticks and drag-flicks a fullish delivery from outside the off stump. Cheeky and innovative.
flat over mid-off. Full-pitched outside off, Ashraful stays where he is and smokes it over mid-off. Flat and hard.
slower one but Ashraful picks it and drops the ball close on the off side and rushes for a quick single
Aftab tries a drag-flick but doesn't connect with the bat. A slow off cutter going down the leg side and he is beaten by the lack of pace. The ball bounds off the boot to Ramdin

Dropped by Fidel Edwards at fine leg. Short in length, on the middle and leg, Ashraful top-edges a pull and it flies down to right of Fidel who rushes towards it, just about manages to get under the ball but ends up palming it
full and straight, on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
full, almost yorker length, on the middle, tickled to short fine leg
low full toss, Aftab mistimes a pull shot to deep midwicket
floater, well outside off stump, Ashraful can't connect with his cut shot. He looks at the umpire hoping for a wide but, rightfully, not given
low full toss, driven to long-off
another full toss - third of the over, mis hit to long-on
length delivery on the off stump line, pulled away to long leg where Dwayne Smith makes a mess. Poor effort .
Stunning inside-out drive. Length delivery on the off stump and Aftab knives it over extra cover
fullish, outside off stump, Aftab is beaten on the drive
surprise bouncer and Aftab is late on the pull and the ball flies over the blade
length delivery on the off and middle, Aftab swivels off the front foot to pull it to long leg. Dwayne fumbles again but recovers to make the stop
hits the deck short of length, outside off stump and again the pull shot brings Dwayne into play. No surprise there, another fumble though not costly this time.
on the middle and leg , top edged a sweep shot to right of short fine leg
floated on the off stump line, late cut to short third man
drifts on to the middle, driven to long-on for another single
full and outside off stump, goes down on his front knee to drill it to deep point where Dwayne collects cleanly.
tossed up, full, swept away for yet another single
slow legcutter, outside off stump, Aftab connect with his slog-drive
Slower one and an interesting stroke there. He was charging down the track, saw mid-way that it was a slower one, adjusted to swipe it over midwicket. Well played.
charges down the track again, Bravo fires in a bouncer and Aftab can't reach
slower one, full, tapped to covers for a quick single
Full-pitched, on the off stump line, lofted cleanly over the bowler's head. Clean as a whistle.
Wonderful adjustment again. It was a slower one, full, Ashraful spotted it quickly, waited on the ball before lofting it to deep midwicket region
Stunning pull shot to end an expensive over. Bangladesh are rocking here. The captain is leading the way. Slightly short in length, on the middle and leg, pulled violently high over long leg.
Gayle continues with his low full toss. On the leg stump this time and Aftab laps it to long leg boundary. Easy.
lands on a length, outside off stump, skids on, Aftab is beaten, trying to late cut
leans forward to push it to backward point, there is an overthrow at the non-striker's end. Poor fielding effort continues.
leans forward, turns to the on side for a quick single
slightly short, outside off, cut to point
yorker, just shaving past the off stump. Aftab had backed away and attempted to square drive
waist-high full toss, on the leg-side, tickled to the leg side. Free hit now!

That's it! Ashraful has the Twenty20 record for the fastest fifty. He has overtaken Jayasuriya who had got it in 23 balls. Full in length, on the middle and leg stump line, Ash short-arm pulled it over fine leg. Stunning and cute.
short in length, pulled away
short in length again, pulled to backward square leg
bouncer outside off stump, swayed away
Awesome hit. Fullish, on the middle stump line, Aftab takes care not to press the front foot across, just leans forward and plays a lovely pick-up shot over wide mid-on.
on the off stump line, sliced to deep cover
short, outside off, pulled to long leg
fullish, outside off, backed away to the leg-side and he drills it to sweeper cover
on the off stump line, swept past square leg.
length delivery outside off, cut past point
a rare dot ball. On the off stump line, defended back to the bowler.
Ashraful moves to the leg-side, tries to pull a short-of-length delivery and inside-edges onto his pad.
swing and a miss. Another slog attempted and the length delivery shaves past the off stump
Violence continues. Take cover boys. Full in length, on the middle, Aftab takes a step or two down the track and heaves it over wide mid-on.
slow loopy bouncer - good variation - but it bounces over the head. Wide called.
Aftab gets his fifty. Full in length, on the off and middle, turned towards midwicket for a single. It has been a impetuous knock.
Short in length, lapped around the corner
pushed to mid-off for a single
full and flat, outside off stump, square driven to sweeper cover
Captain gets captain. low dipping full toss and scooped straight to cover. But what a stunner it has been from Ashraful. The fastest Twenty20 international fifty ever. Violent, brutal and innovative.
on the off stump line, swept with the turn past square leg. It was a mistimed sweep and allows him to rush back for two
spins down the leg side, tickled to fine leg
spins in from outside off stump, cramps him for room and he ends up chopping it to point
slow dipping full toss, on the off stump, pushed to left of cover
short and wide, slapped away to deep point boundary. They are roaring towards the target.
yorker length, on the off stump, driven to deep cover. 17 to win from 27 balls
on the legs, fullish, wristed to deep square leg
full-pitched, hint of swing away, Aftab glides towards the line, opens the bat-face and square drives it through cover point. Fab stroke.
good old outside edge this time. Fullish, moving away a touch and Aftab tries to drive square and ends up with a boundary to third man
on the middle stump line, full, slog-swept to wide long-on
Flighted delivery outside off, Shakib Al Hasan is down the track and scoops it to long-off. Bangladesh are six runs away from victory. Just one stroke away.
on the middle stump line, defended back to the bowler
full and well outside off, left alone.
short in length, outside the off stump, cut past point. Three runs away now.
pushes it well outside the off stump, Aftab doesn't connect with his cut shot

full, straight, on the middle stump line, driven back to the stumps and Rampaul dives to his right and the ball crashes into the stumps at the other side and ricochets towards Rampaul. He recovers to fire in a throw - there was one bail on - and he found his target. It was refered upstairs but the batsman was just in.
full, yorker length, on the middle, driven to long-on
on the middle stump line, tapped to mid-on
And again. Kapali is teasing the spectators here.
Bangladesh have won and West Indies are out of the ICC World Twenty20. Joy and sorrow collide in the arena. Full-pitched, outside off stump, nudged to backward point for the winning run.
